++ Wiki Word History

Wiki Pad maintains a history of the words you have visited.
You can view this history by typing CTRL-H.

To go back in the history type CTRL-ALT-LEFT ARROW
To go forward in the history type CTRL-ALT-RIGHT ARROW

To view the history window with the previous word automatically
selected type CTRL-ALT-UP

To view the history window with the next word automatically
selected type CTRL-ALT-DOWN
